reviews.review_msg: My favourite prof I have had so far at SFU. She has very interactive lectures that work to really engage students. She asks for feedback on her classes and makes sure each topic is understood through videos, group activities, reflections, etc.

Reema is very organized, yet flexible to pivot in response to student needs. Her assigned readings are always interesting. She really cares about student's learning experience. I loved this class and will hopefully get a chance to take more with Reema

I did not receive a grade higher than 78% no matter how nice she was with the comments, she expected as if we had to master the art of know-it-all. her comments are very confusing, and i hate that she is never clear on what she wants, I will never retake her.

Reema is a great professor. Lectures are open to discussion regarding how much emphasis is put on a certain point; I believe this is incredibly important to do as a teacher: let your students say what they need to say, and get what they need to get from the lecture. The readings were interesting and I looked forward to this class.
